import React, {useState, Fragment} from 'react' import './CreateProfile.css' import GooglePlacesAutocomplete from 'react-google-places-autocomplete'; import {connect} from 'react-redux'; import {withRouter,Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import {createProfile,uploadProfilePicture} from '../../../actions/profile' import Alert from '../../alert/Alert' const CreateProfile = ({createProfile,history,uploadProfilePicture}) => { const [formData,setFormData] = useState({ company:'', gender:'', website:'', location:'', image:'', status:'', skills:'', githubusername:'', bio:'', twitter:'', facebook:'', linkedin:'', youtube:'', instagram:'' }) const { company, gender, website, location, imageProfile, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagram } = formData const [displaySocialLinks,toggleBetweenSocial] = useState(false) const onChange = e => { setFormData({...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value})} const setImage = e =>{ setFormData({...formData, imageProfile: e.target.value}) } const onSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() createProfile(formData,history) //update the profile Picture const formImage = new FormData(); formImage.append('imageProfile',imageProfile); console.log(imageProfile) uploadProfilePicture(formImage) console.log(formImage) } return (

onChange(e)}/> Could be your own company or one you are work for

onChange(e)}/> Could be your own or a company website
{setFormData({...formData, location: e.description})}}/> Choose your location
onChange(e)} /> Please use comma separated values (eg.HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
onChange(e)}/> If you want share your latest repos, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself

) } CreateProfile.propTypes = { createProfile: PropTypes.func.isRequired } export default connect(null,{createProfile,uploadProfilePicture})(withRouter(CreateProfile))
